Description.Text:
All of the elegant guestrooms at bh Barranquilla include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and private bathroom facilities. They are fitted with a minibar and a safety deposit box.
Meeting and banquet facilities are available at the property. There is a 24-hour front-desk on site, ready to welcome guests and provide tourist information. Airport shuttles can be arranged.
The nearest airport is Ernesto Cortissoz Airport, 13 km from bh Barranquilla.

Colombian citizens and residents are subject to a 16% national value-added tax (VAT) on room prices payable directly at the hotel. Foreigners and non-residents in Colombia will be exempt of taxes if their travel purposes are only for tourism and be identified with passport stamps with the specified codes TP-11, PIP-5, PTP-5 to be informed on their way through immigration.
